metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of members that should be included in the Administrators local group. Ex: Administrator; myUser1; myUser2

properties.displayName: Audit Windows VMs in which the Administrators group does not contain all of the specified members
properties.description: This initiative deploys the policy requirements and audits Windows virtual machines in which the Administrators group does not contain all of the specified members. For more information on Guest Configuration policies, please visit https://aka.ms/gcpol
